title: Replace site logo with FLAME COMPLAINTS branding

requirements.summary: Replace the existing logo with the FLAME COMPLAINTS branding at the same path and dimensions
acceptanceCriteria: The new FLAME COMPLAINTS logo replaces the existing logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/flame-issue-tracker-logo.dim_512x512.png
The logo maintains 512x512 dimensions as required by the header implementation
The logo displays correctly in the header container with proper aspect ratio
The logo appears consistently across all pages of the application

file_operations.description: Replace the existing logo image file with the generated FLAME COMPLAINTS logo (from image-6.png). The new logo features a blue and orange flame icon with white 'FLAME COMPLAINTS' text on a dark gray background in a square composition. The file must maintain exactly 512x512 pixel dimensions to ensure proper rendering in the header container across all pages. This file is referenced by frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx and will automatically appear in the header navigation.

requirements.summary: Update the favicon to use the new FLAME COMPLAINTS branding
acceptanceCriteria: A favicon asset is generated from the FLAME COMPLAINTS logo
The favicon is properly referenced in frontend/index.html
Browser tabs display the new FLAME COMPLAINTS icon

file_operations.description: Create a 32x32 pixel favicon derived from the FLAME COMPLAINTS logo (generated from image-6.png). This favicon should be optimized for browser tab display, focusing on the recognizable flame icon element from the full logo to ensure visibility at small sizes.

Update the favicon link element to reference the new FLAME COMPLAINTS favicon at frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon.dim_32x32.png. Replace or add the <link rel="icon"> tag in the <head> section to point to the newly generated favicon file, ensuring browser tabs display the new FLAME COMPLAINTS branding.
